hero.title: Cinematic tools for governed worlds
hero.lede: AtlasForge keeps every product, workstation, and console on the same glow-driven language.

intro.title: What is AtlasForge?
intro.copy: AtlasForge is a cohesive ecosystem for shipping governed, lore-safe products. Atlas-V keeps canon honest, AtlasStudio ships the work, and AtlasWave, OIA, and Decision Console prove the loop.

methodology.title: The governance loop
methodology.copy: Brief, generate, validate, and ship. Every step is wrapped in glow cues so teams know which system theyâ€™re touching.
bullets: Briefs originate in AtlasStudio using canon-safe templates.
Atlas-V validates prompts and files against canon.
Decisions are logged in the console with ready-to-ship diffs.
Releases hit OIA, AtlasWave, or other experiences with the same glow language.
